actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To express the sense of the House of Representatives that the House of Representatives should recognize the role that the travel and tourism industry plays in the economy of the United States and should agree to the establishment of the Rural Tourism Development Foundation, as provided for in S. 1204, as passed by the Senate during the 102nd Congress.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that now is the time to act and show support for the establishment of the Rural Tourism Development Foundation.

titles.title: To express the sense of the House of Representatives that the House of Representatives should recognize the role that the travel and tourism industry plays in the economy of the United States and should agree to the establishment of the Rural Tourism Development Foundation, as provided for in S. 1204, as passed by the Senate during the 102nd Congress.
